    • getAuthRanges

      public List<AuthRangeDTO> getAuthRanges(VisitorType visitorType, Long docNumber, Long plotId)
      Retrieves authorization ranges for a visitor.
      Parameters:
      visitorType - the type of visitor.
      docNumber - the document number of the visitor.
      plotId - the ID of the plot.
      Returns:
      a list of AuthRangeDTO with the authorization ranges.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if entity is not found.

    • deleteAuthRange

      public AuthRangeDTO deleteAuthRange(Long id)
      Marks an existing authorization range as inactive based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the authorization range to be deleted.
      Returns:
      an AuthRangeDTO containing the updated authorization range data with the active status set to false.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the specified authorization range ID is not found.

    • updateAuthRange

      public AuthRangeDTO updateAuthRange(Long authRangeId, AuthRangeRequestDTO request)
      Updates an existing authorization range.
      Parameters:
      authRangeId - the unique identifier.
      request - containing the new values for range.
      Returns:
      an AuthRangeDTO updated range data.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if not found.
